name: RWBY Deckbuilding Game
description: RWBY Deckbuilding Game is a new breed of digital card game where you build your deck to defeat an array of deadly foes, or join forces in raids to take down powerful villains. No packs or boosters to chase. Each expansion is a complete experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows速 XP/Windows速 Vista/Windows速 7/Windows速 8 (latest Service Packs) Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 CPU 3.30 GHz Graphics: 1 GB DirectX 9.0c compatible video card DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
